section.name: Properties of the maven-javanet-plugin plugin
section.p: This plugin recognizes the following properties.

tr.td: The name of your java.net project. This property is used by all goals. If you are deploying your project in the site-wide repository, you must not modify this property from the default, and the groupId must match the project name.
The name of the folder in your documents and files section to which distribution files are uploaded. Used by the javanet:dist goal. It can be something like "/release".
The CVSROOT variable used to connect to the java.net CVS server. Used by the javanet:site and javanet:deploy-[artifact] goals.

The directory (relative to the web root) to which site contents are deployed. The value you enter here will be prefixed with ${maven.javanet.project}/www/ to derive the full module name. Used by the javanet:site goal.
